1.text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.

2.text: Bend at your hips and knees to lower yourself into a squatting position.

3.text: Place your hands on the floor in front of you.

4.text: Kick your feet back so that you are in the plank position.

5.text: Drop all the way down to the floor.

6.text: Press up with your arms and jump your feet forward.

7.text: Jump straight upwards to finish the move.

8.text: Do 15 repetitions to complete 1 set of burpees.

9.text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.

10.text: Squat down and touch the floor with your hands.

11.text: Walk your feet back so that you are in push-up position.

12.text: Stand up by walking your feet forward and pushing off the ground.

13.text: Do a pushup when you drop down to the floor.

14.text: Lift weights in the air as you jump or slowly rise to the standing position.

15.text: Add a box jump or tuck jump to the end of your burpees.

16.text: Try doing a 1-legged burpee with a skater hop.
